resources.string:
* Turquoise and Peach Party Wear Saree
* Party Wear Dual Tone Saree
* Saree Fabric : Art Silk and Chiffon
* Blouse Fabric : Dupion

* Specification: Saree length is 5.5 meters; Saree width is 110 cm; Blouse fabric length is 80 cm.\n* Blouse is as shown in the picture. In-skirt fabric is not included\n* Stitching: Unstitched blouse. Blouse can be stitched upto Size 44

* You can get the product from our office
* Home delivery is also available
* You can get the product within three working days after confirmation of the order by our customer care representative
* Delivery charge: Inside Dhaka-49 Taka, outside Dhaka-99 Taka
* You can pay online from your card or bKash, also you can pay cash to our office
* Once the product is purchased,it will not be refundable
* Your booking does not always guarantee product delivery. Product delivery is entirely subjected to availability of stock
* Color of the products may slightly vary due to photography, lighting sources or your monitor setting/ PC resolution
* Product delivery may be interrupted or delayed due to natural disaster or in case of political unrest
* In case of delivery outside Dhaka, customers may have to collect certain products from the nearby courier service office
* If the delivery location is outside of Dhaka city, advance payment is a requirement
* Stock is limited!
